results.title: The Cuckoo = Le Coucou
results.creator_credit: Les Cineastes Animaliers Associes, Francois Bel and Gerard Vienne
results.brief_description: A study of the parasitic reproduction of the cuckoo. The cuckoo does not build itself a nest, but lays its eggs in other bird’s nests and leaves them to hatch and rear its young. However, there are hazards associated with parasitic reproduction; barely ten percent of young cuckoos attain their full growth. Uses natural sound only.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Les Cineastes Animaliers Associes, Francois Bel and Gerard Vienne

However, there are hazards associated with parasitic reproduction; barely ten percent of young cuckoos attain their full growth. Uses natural sound only.

results.title: The Cub scout in the pack
results.creator_credit: Boy Scouts of America. Visual Education Service
results.brief_description: The film illustrates a typical Cub Pack theme, in this case a circus, from beginning to end. Emphasis is placed in the part played by the Cub-master, Den Mothers, Den Dads, Den Chief, parents and Cub Scouts.

results.title: The Cub scout in the den
results.creator_credit: Boy Scouts of America. Visual Education Service
results.brief_description: Shows a typical cub Den in operation including the procedure of a Den meeting. Illustrates the roles played by Den Mother, Den Dad, Den Chief and Denner. Shows how the monthly theme is worked into the Den meeting program and how typical “disciplinary” problems are correctly handled.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Boy Scouts of America. Visual Education Service

results.title: The CSL veterinary story
results.creator_credit: Commonwealth Serum Laboratories (Australia) and Barry Scott
results.brief_description: Manufacture of vaccines at the Commonwealth Serum Laboratories; field stations where animals are kept for the preparation and testing of vaccines; production of penicillin, Salk vaccine and Pulpy Kidney vaccine at the laboratories at Parkville. Over 600 valuable and life-saving products are made to which rigid standards of research and production are applied.

results.title: The Crying red giant (K)
results.brief_description: Claymation film about a lonely red giant who wants to make friends with the people of the local village but everyone is afraid of him. Narrated in english. No other credits available. Suitable for primary school level.

results.title: The Cry for help
results.creator_credit: Louisiana Association for Mental Health, George C Stoney Associates and George C. Stoney
results.brief_description: A training film for police officers and law enforcement agencies; presenting some of the major causes of suicide and follows with consequential discussion on how to handle the suicidal person. Quite powerful and graphic for it’s time.

results.title: The Crusades: saints and sinners
results.creator_credit: Learning Corporation of America and Victor Vicas
results.brief_description: Describes the first crusade, early in the 11th century, and the complex motives which led thousands of people to journey to the Holy Land. The climactic taking of Jerusalem is recreated, and the irony implicit in the concept of a holy war is examined.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Learning Corporation of America and Victor Vicas

results.title: The Cruise of the Magi
results.creator_credit: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit and Shan Benson
results.brief_description: Follows the cruise of the Co-operative Trading Society’s boat ‘The Magi’, along the coast of south east Papua among the Mailu Islands. Shows something of the boat’s trading activities and organisation of the Co-operative, the work of the Co-operative Officer employed by the government, and also aspects of native life.

results.title: The Crucifixion
results.creator_credit: Patrick Ryan, Eltham Films and Tim Burstall
results.brief_description: The camera studies, in close-up, the crucifixion scenes in silver bas relief by the artist Matcham Skipper. This film was photographed in St Mary’s Church, Ivanhoe, Victoria. In place of a narration, the soundtrack uses biblical quotations. Photographed by Giorgio Mangiamele.
